articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: U.S. launches strikes in Syria targeting Islamic State fighters after American deaths - NPR
articles.description: The Trump administration launched military strikes in Syria to "eliminate" Islamic State group fighters in retaliation for an attack that killed two U.S. troops and an American interpreter a week ago.
articles.content: WASHINGTON The Trump administration launched military strikes Friday in Syria to "eliminate" Islamic State group fighters and weapons sites in retaliation for an ambush attack that killed two U.S. tr… [+5132 chars]

articles.author: Adam Wagner
articles.title: Trump revisits a North Carolina town, now the focus of a newly redrawn congressional district - NPR
articles.description: While he is directly appealing to Americans that the economy is improving, President Trump visited a congressional district Republicans are eyeing in their attempts to keep control the U.S. House.
